meanings: (목숨을) kill, take sb's life, (살해하다) murder, (informal) knock sb off, (신문·문학 용어) slay, (학살하다) slaughter, butcher, ...
Verb bring down, make something blunt

vlive.korean: "당신은 사람을 위해 죽일 것인가?" "Will you kill for people?" 듣기 View video BTS : eat jin
경찰은 이렇게 죽일 수 없어? - 너 경찰이야? The policeman can't kill? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “환상의 대똥촉파티(Feat. 마피아게임)” (갓세븐 : GOT7)
여기를 다 죽일 수 있는 생각을 해봐 알았지? Think of an idea that can kill of this team. Okay? 듣기 View video X1 : 송편만들기🌕
vlive.english: Think of an idea that can kill of this team. Okay?

vlive.korean: 그렇게는 죽일 수 없어 - 그래? You can't kill him like that. - Really? 듣기 View video PENTAGON : 릴레이 V LIVE : Hip Hop Unit
vlive.english: You can't kill him like that. - Really?

vlive.korean: [와락] - 나 죽일 거야? - 방금... [Hug] - Are you going to kill me? - Oh just now... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.72
vlive.english: [Hug] - Are you going to kill me? - Oh just now...

examples.korean: An increase in crime could kill the golden goose of tourism. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 범죄 증가가 관광업이라는 황금 알을 낳는 거위를 죽일 수도 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She gave him a murderous look. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 그를 잡아 죽일 듯이 쳐다보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She gave him a murderous look. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was capable of killing a man with his bare hands. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 맨손으로도 사람을 죽일 수 있는 자였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was capable of killing a man with his bare hands. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I could cheerfully have killed him when he said that. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 그 말을 했을 때 난 기꺼이 그를 죽일 수도 있을 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I could cheerfully have killed him when he said that. Add to Wordbook
